function ERU_EP04_14()
    -- .転-4【12月第1週】「変態という名のご子息だよ」
    SaveData.Title = "変態という名のご子息だよ"

    -- //BG：男子部教室（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG015ba")

    -- //BU：オウガ（通常）、ウラン（通常）、先輩たち（通常）
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01aa")
    --LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MAA01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 0,true)

    MSG([[ There really was someone close connected to the "Phoenix" group. And all of them were big companies whose names I had definitely heard before. ]])

    MSG([[ No way, Mask Senpais were people from such an amazing family line...? ]])

    MSG([[ There were so many things I wanted to ask, but first I voiced the question that mattered most. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1353.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】通常
 "Why do such amazing people all gather at Yuriai Private Academy?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ At my question, the senpais exchanged glances and showed hesitation. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0123.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】通常
 "Since this is a good opportunity, should we be honest?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0091.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #2】通常
 "I agree! It’s also painful to keep any more secrets!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0123.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】通常
 "Hey, hey... I don’t know about this." ]])

    MSG([[ Mask Senpai #3 wasn’t enthusiastic, but didn’t try to stop the others. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0124.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】通常
 "Originally, we entered Yuriai Private Academy at the request of the Himegami family." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1354.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】焦り
 "I-is that so...? For what exactly?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0124.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】通常
 "There aren’t many who would willingly be the very first students at such a special school..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0125.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】通常
 "Also... those who opposed going co-ed would find it hard to object once you say there’s a connection to the three heirs of the Phoenix Group." ]])

    MSG([[ That made sense. I felt convinced by Mask Senpai #3’s explanation. ]])

    MSG([[ Indeed, Yuriai Academy’s boys’ division is a very unusual environment, and even a prestigious school like this wouldn’t normally attract anyone but students with special circumstances, like Ouga or me. ]])

    MSG([[ It made perfect sense that the Himegami family, wanting to promote co-education to not fall short of capacity, would work behind the scenes. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0125.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】通常
 "Oh—there was such a reason for it." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0092.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #2】通常
 "We were told this was a wonderful school full of girls! It truly was a paradise!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1355.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】苦笑・汗
 "Mask Senpai #1 and #2, that’s honestly just how you feel, right?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Seeing Mask Senpai #1 and #2 react with complete surprise and relief made me feel somewhat reassured. ]])

    MSG([[ Apparently, not all of their strange behavior up to now was an act. ]])

    MSG([[ Saying "I’m relieved because they’re real perverts" sounds odd, but I felt that way anyway. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0126.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】通常
 "Well... that’s why all of us have some connection to the Himegami family." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0127.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】通常
 "Especially me... somehow I ended up liked by Lady Nemesia... so they leave all kinds of troublesome jobs to me." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0128.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】通常
 "If anyone’s gonna teach Nemesia a lesson... I’ll lend you my strength... heh heh." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,800,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0453.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】通常
 "Are you sure? There might be retaliation from the Himegami family, you know?" ]])

    MSG([[ Ouga and Uran asked Mask Senpai #3, who let out a sinister laugh. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-800,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0980.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】焦り
 "Th-that’s right. If you become a traitor and catch their attention..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0129.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】通常
 "Hey, hey... retaliation against us?" ]])

    MSG([[ The seniors laughed loudly. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MAA01ma")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0126.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】興奮
 "We have nothing left to lose!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0093.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #2】興奮
 "We can’t be masochists scared of retaliation!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0130.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】興奮
 "We’re all just fallen folks anyway... don’t worry about it... More importantly, save Hermes-chan." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ja")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1356.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】泣き笑い
 "E-everyone... thank you so much." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ They were willing to be this kind despite the danger it might bring on themselves. I was genuinely glad to rely on everyone. ]])

    MSG([[ Just talking with everyone about a problem I could never solve alone steadily brought hope. ]])

    MSG([[ Before entering Yuriai Academy, when I couldn’t make friends properly and was only thinking about my sister Marika, this was something I could never have known. ]])

    -- //BU：リラ（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(80,"BU_RIR07ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("rira_plus0002.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】笑顔
 "Minato-kun, why are you crying~? Are you that happy~?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_plus0050.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】泣き笑い
 "Yes... I’m that happy. To think that everyone would go this far for someone like me... I don’t even know how to thank you." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(80,"BU_RIR07ia")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("rira_plus0003.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】ウインク
 "No, it’s the other way around. It’s because you and Erika have worked so hard all this time that everyone’s paying you back now." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(80,"BU_RIR07aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("rira_plus0004.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】通常
 "Just feel free to rely on your friends more. I and Hiyu can’t do anything this time, but we’re always here to listen to you when you need to vent." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_plus0051.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】泣き笑い
 "Yes... thank you, Lira-san. I’m really glad I came to this school." ]])

    -- //BU：リラ（笑顔）、ヒユ（笑顔）
    -- //BU：オウガ（笑顔）、ウラン（笑顔）、先輩たち（興奮）
    LAYER_LOAD(80,"BU_RIR07ea")
    LAYER_LOAD(75,"BU_HIY01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(75,-350,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(70,450,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_OGA01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,800,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MAA01ma")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-650,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ I bowed my head to each person supporting me and once again formally asked for their cooperation. ]])

    -- //BU：なし
    LAYER_LOAD(80,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(75,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG011ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ From that day, things began to move smoothly. ]])

    MSG([[ Mask Senpai #3 told me the dates for the regular meetings he attended with the Himegami family and suggested I accompany him when he entered the Himegami family’s main residence. ]])

    MSG([[ And finally, the day arrived for the operation to save Arumeria-san— ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERU_EP04_15")
end
